name: AxleDash
description:
A game based on one simple mechanic - dash to position yourself in order to hit the correct side of your current obstacle. As time passes, the multiplier increases and so does the speed of time. 

This version of AxleDash, however, differs a bit from the mobile version: the obstacles can now come from the left and right as well! The gameplay still runs the same though, so if you come from the mobile version, it all quickly becomes second nature!

Well now, if you are up for a challenge, give it a shot! 

[ADDITIONAL INFORMATION]

How to play: Click (Left Mouse Button) or Spacebar

Where the menu is: Click the side triangles inside the circle.
